title: The Magic of Walt Disney world
creator_credit: Tom Leetch, Ron Miller and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Disneyland was the prototype for this larger, more advanced amusement park in Florida. The range of attractions for the tourist are accordingly diverse and spectacular, from the Polynesian Village to the monorail ride and the Fort Wilderness camping ground.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Leetch, Ron Miller and Walt Disney Productions
